articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.title: The Surface Duo is finally getting Android 11 - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft has begun to roll out Android 11 for unlocked Surface Duos in North America and Europe. The company said in 2021 that it was working to release the update by the end of the year, but it missed that target.
articles.content:
The update is finally rolling out
The Surface Duo is getting Android 11 at last.
Photo by Vjeran Pavic / The Verge
At the beginning of this month, my colleague Monica Chin published an article wit… [+1011 chars]

articles.author: Brian Keogh
articles.title: Disappointing final round as Power fades in California but 14th place finish sees him jump Lowry in world rankings - Independent.ie
articles.description: SÉAMUS POWER overtook Shane Lowry and moved up two spots to 47th in the world rankings despite his final round reverse in The American Express in California.
articles.content:
